About me:

Senior full stack Java developer with 10+ years development experience.

Main expertise is full stack web application development beginning to end, API micro services design/development, complex mult-threading system design/development, with Agile methodologies.

Experienced with AWS services:

-EC2 machine provisioning, VPC security groups, Load balancers, WAF application firewalls, ElastiCaches, RDS databases, Elastic Beanstalk applications, Lambdas applications, API gateways, S3 storages, Cloud watch logs, Route 53, etc...
